p: For the remaining compounds, namely bisabola‐1,8,12‐triene, (E)‐α‐bergamotene, bicyclogermacrene, tricyclene [01.060], δ‐germacrene [01.042], (l)‐α‐bisabolol, l‐fenchone, bornyl acetate [09.017], trans‐carveol, cis‐carveol [02.062] and cis‐para‐2,8‐menthadien‐1‐ol, toxicity studies and NOAEL values performed with the compounds under assessment were not available and read‐across was not possible. Therefore, the TTC approach was applied (EFSA FEEDAP Panel, 2017b).
